rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50, 75}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGC3120, MGG3681, MGP2278, MGW3681}
Unit was previously coded {MGC3120, MGF3681%, MGM2681, MGW2681, MGW3681%, MGX3681}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGF2351, MGS2351, MGW2351} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGC3120, MGG3681, MGP2278, MGW3681}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50, 75}
Unit was previously coded {MGC3120, MGF3681%, MGM2681, MGW2681, MGW3681%, MGX3681}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB1010, MGF1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Management theory and its application in various cultures. Topics covered include: the role of culture; motivation; global leadership; international human resources management; international teams, and ethics and social responsibility.
